example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS ذكرت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN_PROP شيراك)) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يبذل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الجهود) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الديبلوماسية)) (PP-PRP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اجل) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN منع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN اسرائيل)) (PP-CLR (PREP من) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN القيام)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN أي) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اعتداء))) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المنشآت) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجديدة)))) (PUNC ,)

arg.g: From carrying out any attack on the new facilities

example.arg: من القيام بأي اعتداء على المنشآت الجديدة
